content: single_crochet and ch1 space single_crochet in next 3 st single_crochet in next chain space single_crochet in next st single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in next corner ch2 space* repeat block your square if necessary from * to * around omitting the last corner stitches close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 2 fpdc 1 fphdc 14 single_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus august 2025 it s not allowed to sell or publish this pattern or parts of it no uploading on social media copyright is mine
